name: Aston
description: label

name: Roll4yourlife
description: Sleek black leather keeps this loafer crisp, and a penny strap tipped with discreet red stitching adds character, while a lightweight cupsole cushions your strides from boardroom entrances to sidewalk detours. Pair it with tapered navy trousers for client lunches or roll with cuffed denim at weekend gigs-the polished upper never flinches.

name: Zethan
description: High-gloss patent leather meets textured mesh in a deep burgundy low-top, making everyday strolls a statement, while the sleek rubber cupsole cushions and grips so city laps stay light. Anchor black jeans for gallery openings or pair with tailored joggers on flight days—the tonal build travels light.

name: Brando
description: Espresso suede envelopes this ankle boot with understated elegance, while a slim leather outsole adds a feather-light touch, making each step on the pavement purposeful. Pair with grey wool trousers for business lunches or team with dark denim for relaxed evenings-the sleek design keeps the focus where you want it.

name: Hawkinshigh
description: Rally the troops! These Stranger Things x ALDO varsity sneakers, with retro terry cloth patch, tiger print sock, and removable Hawkins tag, have just the right aura of preppy cool. When it comes to style, you're top of the class.

name: Lewistown
description: label

name: Zeddyy
description: Warm brown suede defines a Chelsea silhouette that glides through your day with ease, elastic entry panels and back pulls making it quick to slip on, while a rubber outsole keeps every step confident. Team it with charcoal tailoring for meetings or dark denim for nights out, and let the finish whisper polish without effort.

name: Lionel
description: Hand-cut tassel saddle arcs across sleek black leather, giving this loafer movement and a quiet confidence, while a low-profile cup sole keeps you comfortable from early meetings to late-night strolls. Team it with charcoal suiting for pitches, or wear it beneath cuffed chinos for rooftop drinks.

name: Davie
description: Cabin-ready silhouette defines these chukkas, with the moc stitching adding craft, while a lug sole grips confidently on sidewalks and gravel trails, rain or shine all day. Pair them with denim for a market visit, or roll with wool cargos for office days around town.

name: Hellfireclub
description: Pledge your allegiance to the Hellfire Club in these limited-edition Stranger Things x ALDO black leather runners. The removable hang tag and Hellfire print sock bring a hotter than hellfire, rebellious energy to every step.

name: Thevoid
description: White leather meets airflow-driven side panels, giving this silhouette a breathable feel while a gum cupsole cushions every step, grounding the look with casual confidence and a touch of urban edge. Team it with cuffed chinos for game-day hangs, or anchor dark joggers for snack runs, moving effortlessly from the stadium to weekend spots.

name: Arturo
description: Polished buckle hardware defines the loafer, and a cushioned cup sole keeps every stride across meetings to dinners, letting this silhouette carry you from desk to night out on the go with ease. Pair it with tailoring for meetings, or jeans with a polo for after-work drinks.

name: Thevoid
description: Distressed overlays meet checkerboard panels to shape a silhouette that moves with confidence, while a hangtag and laces add a detail and a rubber cupsole keeps every stride light and grounded. Team it with joggers for weekday record hunts or roll with cuffed chinos for weekend backyard hangs.

name: Zeddyy
description: Saddle-brown suede Chelsea boots feature side panels for wear, a profile, and lugged soles that grip streets from commutes to adventures, moving you through doors and across rooms with confidence every day. Pair them with trousers for meetings, and with denim for strolls across town.

name: Braz
description: Glossy cognac leather defines this minimalist Oxford, where a supple leather sole ensures every step feels fluid, transforming daily meetings into effortless strolls with understated elegance. Anchor it with navy suits for major presentations or balance denim on gallery nights-the almond toe keeps your look impeccably sharp.

name: Draco
description: Mahogany leather pairs with a comfortable padded collar in this combat boot, and a lug sole grips city sidewalks, keeping your steps confident from workday commutes to late-night gigs. Anchor it with denim for laid-back backyard gatherings, or pair with chinos for those creative presentations-the mahogany finish blends rugged and refined effortlessly.

name: Esttanqueiro
description: Stormy grey matte upper and metal eyelets climb to the ankle in this streamlined high-top, its cushy rubber cup sole absorbing daily pavement shock while tonal stitching keeps the look stealth. Anchor black joggers for weekend errands or pair cuffed chinos for casual drinks—its clean palette plays nicely wherever plans wander.

name: Armie
description: Smooth leather meets suede at the heel, a tactile contrast, while the two-tone lugged outsole provides trail-grade grip on sidewalks without extra weight. Pair with flannel overshirts and dark denim for weekend markets, or cuff wool trousers for casual office Fridays—the contrast stitching adds polish.

name: Ccourtline
description: All-over embossing on the side panels gives this cupsole sneaker quiet flair that sneaks into every look, while lightweight synthetic uppers and a cushioned sole keep city miles easy. Style it with joggers for airport dashes or cuffed chinos for meetups—muted tones adapt to anywhere the day takes you.

name: Darion
description: Polished brown leather wraps this ankle boot, blending a cap-toe with rugged lug-sole grip for a grounded, all-day stride that looks as ready as you feel. Team it with trousers for the office or roll denim for weekend dinners, letting the finish do the talking through every step.

name: Draco
description: label

name: Justin
description: Glass beads mix-and-match sizes circle the wrist in a black-sheen glow punctuated by gilded cubes and a pave sphere, delivering a ready-made trio that never feels fussy. Layer them with a denim jacket and slip dress for cocktails, or stack beside a chunky knit for weekend coffee runs.

name: Lionel
description: Espresso-brown polished leather gives this loafer depth, while twin tassels over the moc apron add movement to keep boardroom polish relaxed on the walk home. Anchor navy suiting for promotion pitches, or roll with cuffed chinos for dinners—the sleek profile handles every moment with quiet grace.

name: Armie
description: City-ready grey leather and suede panels meet rugged trail-bred lug treads in this combat boot, while a plush faux-fur lining keeps the warmth locked in and metallic eyelets ensure smooth lacing. Pair them with cuffed denim for weekend markets or with cargo joggers and a flannel jacket for cozy nights by the firepit.

name: Farrell
description: Brown leather features topside lacing and metal grommets reminiscent of classic deck shoes, while a suede collar and a lugged rubber outsole guarantee comfort in every step. Pair with cuffed selvedge denim for weekend market strolls or team with wool trousers on casual Fridays-the boat-lace detail straddles the line between relaxed and refined.

name: Konnor
description: Two-tone leather and textile upper bring casual polish, with warm brown overlays and a charcoal panel creating contrast, while a chunky cup sole ensures confidence. Wear it with charcoal denim for coffee runs or tailored chinos for meetings, letting the finish speak.

name: Amur
description: Midnight suede adorned with tonal micro-studs adds a touch of subtle sparkle to this almond-toe boot, while the rubber block heel makes it perfect for those long city strolls. Pair it with black skinny jeans for rooftop events or elevate a satin suit at winter galas-the sparkle truly sets the tone.

name: Samuel
description: Midnight velvet shapes this loafer, a clean silhouette with a buckle that brings polish to every stride, ready to move from meetings to after-hours mingling. Pair it with a suit for client dinners, or roll with denim and a blazer for evenings, then let the finish do the talking at after-parties.

name: Amur
description: Rich burgundy leather infuses this ankle boot with an air of confidence, and a hidden side zip slides you in smoothly, while a low block heel ensures city-friendly movement from morning meetings to late-night adventures. Pair it with slim black denim for art show evenings or match it with charcoal suits at winter weddings-the sleek almond toe remains polished.

name: Melville
description: Suede shapes this loafer with a penny strap and heritage-inspired stitching, while interior padding keeps steps steady for hours on the go. Team it with chinos for meetings, or pair with denim for dinners, commutes, and errands.

name: Blyth
description: Deep-cut lug soles grip wet streets, while leather uppers keep the silhouette timeless, and metal eyelets with tonal stitching add a polished flair suited for any forecast. Team with cuffed denim for rooftop gigs, or pair with tapered wool trousers for Monday meetings, anchoring your look from dawn to dusk.

name: Blyth
description: Earthy brown leather and metal eyelets frame this lace-up boot, and its deep-tread lug sole handles both sidewalks and trails, making it perfect for any weather. Pair with cuffed selvedge denim for Saturday markets or a wool overcoat and chinos for weekday commutes-traction keeps you steady.

name: Darion
description: Black leather cap-toe combat boot with a durable lug sole anchors edge without shouting, while a padded collar cushions the ankle and metal eyelets offer dependable lacing—every stride feels ready for the day. Team it with denim for weekday runs or anchor a tailored suit for downtown nights—its finish does the talking.

name: Lynx
description: Angled rugged mesh wraps the black boot, delivering breathable comfort as a reliable outsole grips uneven terrain and every stride, while metal eyelets and hiking laces lock in dependable support. Team cargos for dawn trails or roll dark denim for post-trek patios to anchor your day from hike to hangout.

name: Samuel
description: Emerald velvet drapes this slip-on loafer in quiet luxury, while a matte horsebit lends sculpted shine and a low stacked heel steadies every step with effortless poise for days that flow from desk to after-hours. Pair with tailored trousers for a gala-ready moment, or cuffed denim and a lightweight blazer for a versatile city evening.

name: Konnor
description: Black leather combines with a lightweight textile panel for a sleek urban look that moves with you, while a cup sole offers everyday comfort. Pair it with charcoal chinos for meetings, or go with dark denim and a bomber for laid-back weekend errands.

name: Gordo
description: Retro-runner suede panelling teams with crisp white nylon, while a grippy gum ripple outsole locks traction in place and an airy foam midsole lightens every stride from sunrise walks to late-night runs. Pair it with tapered joggers for weekend brunch or anchor cuffed chinos on casual Fridays-the retro lines handle both effortlessly.

name: Zethan
description: Ripple-textured leather pairs with suede accents to define a look, a cushioned sole absorbs shocks for errands and outings, delivering comfort that carries you through the day. Pair it with joggers for gigs, or roll with trousers for Fridays at the office, and carry it into evenings and weekends.

name: Gordo
description: Midnight-blue suede pairs with smooth leather panels on this jogger, catching light across contrast textures as a cushioned rubber sole keeps daily miles easy and the silhouette ready for coffee runs or longer city strolls. Team it with cuffed chinos for patio brunches, or roll with jogger pants on red-eye flights.

name: Torroo
description: Cognac suede shapes this streamlined chukka, with silhouettes and tonally stitched unlined interiors that keep weights light while rubber-cup soles cushion each stride. Pair them with charcoal wool pants for client gatherings or roll with darker denim for casual Fridays, and the burnished finish does the talking.

name: Melville
description: Cognac leather shapes a streamlined loafer on a lug sole, adding edge without losing polish, so you move through office days and city nights with confidence. Pair it with chinos for boardroom moments, or with denim and a blazer for dinner dates, anchoring workdays to evenings.

name: Visco
description: Midnight-smooth leather meets a subtly grained heel panel cinched by a strap and buckle, delivering rider energy with a silhouette and a heel that keeps movement easy through commutes and evenings. Pair it with denim for gallery openings or anchor it under a suit for winter weddings.

name: Farrell
description: Moc-stitched toes and 360 rawhide lacing give these ankle boots a rugged, handcrafted presence, while cushioned collars keep every step comfortable on long days, from morning markets to dusk hikes. Roll with cargos for Saturday market strolls, or pair with denim for bonfire nights—the lugs are ready for any terrain.

name: Clubcrew
description: Ribbed cotton crew socks in beige, grey, and rust wrap feet in soft daily comfort, made for long days from campus coffee runs to late-night study sessions. Let them peek above loafers or sneakers with pleated minis for campus sprints, and cinch weekend denim or bike shorts for brunch runs.

name: Samuel
description: High-shine patent leather meets a bite of metal hardware, giving this loafer a glow that stands out, while a low stacked heel and smooth leather lining keep every stride easy from day-to-night. Pair it with charcoal tailoring for gala nights or slip it beneath indigo denim for rooftop dates—two looks, one polished finish.
